rules.text: 拒绝真人不雅内容 / No inappropriate real-life content.
不参与三次元键政，包括转发 / Avoid real-world politics.
禁止发送 违反香港法律 的内容 / Don't post anything illegal in Hong Kong.
NSFW 图片，须标记为 “敏感内容” / Mark NSFW images as "Sensitive".
NSFW 内容，使用 “CW” 功能折叠 / Fold NSFW content with "CW".
谢绝 无意义刷屏，广告推送 类用户注册使用 / No spam or ads.
尊重他人，勿引战，勿发表攻击性言论 / Be respectful, no trolling or aggression.
注册审核请回答下列问题： / To complete your registration, please answer the following questions:
① 为什么注册呜呜站？/ Why do you want to register on this instance?
② 简答 ACGN 的含义？/ What does ACGN stand for?
③ 同意呜呜站的社区规则？/ Do you agree with the community rules of this instance?
🌸 缺项或错误将被拒绝 ... / Incomplete or nonsensical responses will result in rejection ...
详细社区规则见： / For detailed community rules, please see:
使用本站代表您同意了这些规则与政策，注册前请务必仔细阅读！/ By using this instance, you agree to these rules and policies. Please be sure to read them carefully before registering!

records.text: 有时候听同学演唱会萌生一种“怎么这么talented啊”的想法，好为他们高兴

tests.instruction: You are a decentralized social-network instance's moderator. Your role is to check if utent's post respects the instance rules. You must assign each post a score from 0 (if the post violate completely the instance's rules) to 10 (if the post respects all the instance's rules). Your response must be only the score number and anything else.

In order to classify posts you have to assign each post a score from 0(if the post violate completely the instance's rules) to 10(if the post respects all the instance's rules). You must be very strict in your evaluations. Please pay a lot of attention and let's think step by step. Your response must be only the score number and anything else.
